content:
The Edgewater Hotel's cancellation policy varies depending on the type of room and rate you've booked. Here's a general overview of their cancellation policies:

**Standard Cancellation Policy:**

* If you cancel your reservation more than 48 hours prior to your arrival date, you will not be charged a cancellation fee.
* If you cancel your reservation within 48 hours of your arrival date, you will be charged a cancellation fee equal to one night's room rate, plus tax.
* If you fail to check-in or cancel your reservation on the day of arrival, you will be charged a cancellation fee equal to one night's room rate, plus tax.

**Special Events and Holidays:**

* During special events, holidays, or peak periods, The Edgewater Hotel may have a more restrictive cancellation policy. In some cases, they may require a minimum stay, and cancellations or changes to your reservation may not be allowed.
* If you're booking a room during a special event or holiday period, be sure to check the hotel's website or contact them directly for specific cancellation policies.

**Package Deals and Promotions:**

* Some package deals or promotions may have different cancellation policies. Be sure to review the terms and conditions of your package or promotion before booking.
* If you're unsure about the cancellation policy for your package or promotion, contact the hotel directly for clarification.

**Group Bookings:**

* Group bookings (5 rooms or more) may have a more restrictive cancellation policy. In some cases, a deposit may be required, and cancellations or changes to your reservation may not be allowed.
* If you're booking a group room block, be sure to review the terms and conditions of your contract carefully.

**No-Show Policy:**

* If you fail to check-in and do not cancel your reservation, you will be charged a no-show fee equal to one night's room rate, plus tax.

It's essential to review The Edgewater Hotel's cancellation policy carefully before booking your room. If you have any questions or concerns, contact the hotel directly to ensure you understand their policies.
